Title: The Chinese people have high aspirations
Designer: Shanghai No. 3 Printing and Dyeing Mill Revolutionary committee political propaganda group (上海第三印染厂革委会政宣组)
Notes: Below right workers are celebrating the successful trial production of the SH380 32-ton dump truck for mining, September 1969 at the Shanghai Automobile Manufacturing Plant. The SH380 was based on a Russian example.The slogan in the background, top left: "Independent and self-reliant" (独立自主自力更 生).
